projects.title: Projects
projects.mobiText: Mobi is an interactive mobile application developed to collect data on urban transportation and the movement of students and staff at CEFET-RJ. The tool also aims to promote improvements in the mobility experience of the academic community, based on real data.
projects.mobiDashboardText: Mobi Dashboards is an interactive web application developed for visualizing and extracting insights from urban transport and commuting data for students and staff at CEFET-RJ. The tool also aims to foster improvements in the mobility experience of the academic community, based on real data collected via the MOBI app.
projects.fastInvestText: Fast Invest is an interactive web application aimed at investors who want to organize, analyze, and track their investments in a practical and personalized way. The platform was designed to offer advanced tools for filtering, monitoring, and analyzing stocks, helping users make informed and strategic decisions in the financial market.
projects.locadoraCefetText: This work was developed during Web Development classes at CEFET-RJ UNED Nova Iguaçu. During development, we had our first contactHTTP methods and CRUD operations.
